reviewText: Buffalo Bill was one of a kind. I recommend this movie. It puts his life in the context of his time. I could go on and on but all I will say is: buy it, watch it, you won't regret it.

Well done DVD with historic clips and plenty of information and history. I would reccomend this DVD to anyone who is looking for the inside scoop on Bill Cody. I especially loved the old film clips which are hard to find.
